name: beast-chatmode-general
description: General-purpose Copilot instruction set for Beast Chat Mode (beast-4.1). Use these prompts as templates in chat/agent mode.

instructions.label: Explain this function
instructions.prompt: Explain this function: "<paste code or file path>" — 단계별로, 각 입력과 출력, 복잡도와 모호한 부분을 지적해줘.

instructions.label: Summarize the repository
instructions.prompt: Summarize the repository: "<repo root or brief context>" — 목적, 핵심 컴포넌트, 엔트리 포인트를 간결히 정리해줘.

instructions.label: Create unit tests
instructions.prompt: Create unit tests for: "<file or function>" (framework: <jest/pytest/...>) — 가능한 경우 테스트 코드와 설명을 함께 제공해줘.

instructions.label: Refactor to be more readable
instructions.prompt: Refactor to be more readable/idiomatic: "<file or code>" — 변경 이유와 개선된 코드를 제시해줘.

instructions.label: Add types/type hints
instructions.prompt: Add types/type hints to: "<file or function>" (target: TypeScript/Python typing) — 변경 예시와 타입 정의를 포함해줘.

instructions.label: Find security issues
instructions.prompt: Find security issues in: "<file or repo>" — 취약점 요약과 권장 수정사항을 알려줘.

instructions.label: Optimize for performance
instructions.prompt: Optimize this code for performance: "<code snippet or file>" — 병목 분석, 복잡도, 개선된 코드 제안 포함.

instructions.label: Write a migration plan
instructions.prompt: Write a migration plan to add feature: "<feature description>" — 필요한 파일/데이터베이스/엔드포인트 변경과 단계별 작업 리스트.

instructions.label: Generate commit message
instructions.prompt: Generate commit message for: "<short change summary>" — conventional commits 스타일(예: feat/fix/docs).

instructions.label: Create PR description
instructions.prompt: Create PR description from: "<diff or brief list of changes>" — 요약, 테스트 방법, 체크리스트 포함.

instructions.label: Convert to another language/framework
instructions.prompt: Convert this to <language/framework>: "<code or file>" — 목표 플랫폼의 관례에 맞게 변환해줘.

instructions.label: Add logging and error handling
instructions.prompt: Add logging and error handling to: "<file or function>" — 권장 위치와 코드 패치 예시 포함.

instructions.label: Produce API documentation
instructions.prompt: Produce API documentation for: "<endpoint or controller>" — 요청/응답 예시와 스키마, 예제 포함.

instructions.label: Provide test and edge cases
instructions.prompt: Provide test cases and edge cases for: "<function or feature>" — 정상/비정상/경계값 케이스 목록.

instructions.label: Suggest dependency updates
instructions.prompt: Suggest dependency updates and breaking changes for: "<package.json or build file>" — 주요 변경과 마이그레이션 권장사항.

instructions.label: Create minimal reproducible example
instructions.prompt: Create a minimal reproducible example that demonstrates: "<bug or behavior>" — 실행 가능한 샘플과 재현 방법.

instructions.label: Explain failing test
instructions.prompt: Explain why this test fails and how to fix it: "<test output + code>" — 원인 진단과 수정안.

instructions.label: Create CI workflow
instructions.prompt: Create CI job for: <platform e.g., GitHub Actions> — 빌드, 테스트, 린트 포함한 예제 워크플로우.

instructions.label: Write changelog entry
instructions.prompt: Write a changelog entry for: "<version + notable changes>" — 사용자 중심 릴리스 노트.

instructions.label: Accessibility checklist
instructions.prompt: Provide an accessibility checklist for: "<UI component or page>" — WCAG 기반 점검 항목과 개선 권장사항.
